name: nativescript-particle
description: Control your Particle.io devices from a NativeScript app!

scripts.build: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios.bundled: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android.bundled: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-particle && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.generate-typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings. Afterwards, remove that folder, and the (intermediate) metadata-* folders.'
scripts.generate-typings.android: echo '##### Download the latest relevant .aar file from https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.particle, rename .aar to .zip and extract it. Then move classes.jar to the plugin /src folder' && java -jar ../../android-dts-generator/dts-generator/build/libs/dts-generator.jar -input ./classes.jar -output platforms/android/typings && rimraf classes.jar && echo '##### Done! Deleted src/classes.jar, and generated typings in src/platforms/android/typings/'
